div.head: 小便遺
div.div: involuntary minor relief; involuntary loss of urine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: involuntary minor relief; involuntary loss of urine

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with yi niao 遺尿 , [involuntary] loss of urine. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：虛則欠咳小便遺 , “Depletion brings forth yawning, cough, and an involuntary loss of urine ”.
